holidays.title: 55 mph Speed Limit Day
holidays.description: Keep your foot off the gas because it’s time to go 55 and under.

holidays.title: Ancestry Day
holidays.description: On Ancestry Day, we commemorate the labor of past heroes and their struggle for independence.

holidays.title: Happy Mew Year for Cats Day
holidays.description: Slip extra catnip, and give cats in need the chance for a fresh start.

holidays.title: Motivation and Inspiration Day
holidays.description: Get up, get inspired, and get moving on National Motivation and Inspiration Day.

holidays.title: National Buffet Day
holidays.description: A good buffet is like getting all of the presents on your Christmas-wish-list.

holidays.title: National Cream Puff Day
holidays.description: Visit a favorite bakery. Bring out those baking trays. Do you hear those cream puffs calling?

holidays.title: National Erica Day
holidays.description: Be like Erika and forge your own path in life, as it should be.

holidays.title: National Personal Trainer Day
holidays.description: Appreciate the individuals who put in time, patience, and sweat to help you get fit.

holidays.title: National Pet Travel Safety Day
holidays.description: See our awesome tips to celebrate this day and give your pet the best travel experience!

holidays.title: New Year's Day Substitute
holidays.description: Let's get ready to celebrate the best day ever after New Year’s.

holidays.title: Reconquest Day
holidays.description: Learn about the Reconquest — one of the greatest events that changed the course of Spanish history.

holidays.title: Run it Up the Flagpole and See If Anyone Salutes it Day
holidays.description: It's the perfect day to think of the craziest ideas and put them out there.

holidays.title: Saint Basil's Day
holidays.description: We remember and honor a great man who had many inspiring, noble qualities.

holidays.title: Swiss Cheese Day
holidays.description: Put on a bib and get ready to dig into the backstory of this creamy cheese.

holidays.title: World Introvert Day
holidays.description: Cancel your social outings and get in your pajamas because it’s World Introvert Day!

holidays.title: Vasant Panchami
holidays.description: A festival that honors a goddess and marks the preparation for the arrival of spring.

holidays.title: Bryson Tiller’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented singer and songwriter has captured the hearts of millions around the world.

holidays.title: Colby Brock’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this multi-talented YouTube star, the sky is just his starting point.

holidays.title: Dax Shepard’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented comedian, actor, and director became famous due to his comedic films and television shows.

holidays.title: London Charles’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star and model has never given up on her dreams, no matter what!

holidays.title: Taye Diggs’s Birthday
holidays.description: An actor, Broadway star, and role model, Diggs has left no stone unturned in his career.

holidays.title: Tfue’s Birthday
holidays.description: This record-breaking eSports gamer is still shooting his way to the top.

holidays.title: Will Kirby’s Birthday
holidays.description: This osteopathic physician, dermatologist, and T.V. star has taken center stage in reality T.V.
